verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
If worship be the fuel for mission's flame
With going with a passion for your name
We're going for we care about your praise
Send us out

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let worship be the heart of missions aim
To see the nations recognize your fame
Till every tribe and tongue voices your praise
Send us out

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
You should be the praise of every tongue
You should be the joy of every heart
Until the fullness of your kingdom comes
Until that final revelation dawns
Send us out

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Every tribe, Every tongue
Every creature in the heaven and the earth
Every Heart, Every soul
We'll sing your praise; we'll sing your praise
Every note, every strain
Every melody will be for you alone
Every harmony that flows from every tongue
We'll sing your praise

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
You should be the praise of every tongue
You should be the joy of every heart
You should be the praise of every tongue
You should be the joy of every heart
Until the fullness of your kingdom comes
Until that final revelation dawns
Send us out
Send us out
Send us out
Send us out
